message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to invest in something that will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $11,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm willing to offer you $10,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to me, and it leaves room for both of us to make a good deal.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $10,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to you, and I'm willing to compromise to reach an agreement.
